comment: Equality theorem for class not-free. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 16-Nov-2019.) Avoid ~ ax-12 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 19-Jun-2023.)
